fields.name: color
fields.title: Color
fields.description: A color associated with this item.

seed.name: Delivered
seed.description: Representing the successful delivery of an order.

seed.name: Cancelled
seed.description: Representing the cancellation of an order.

seed.name: In Transit
seed.description: Representing that an order is in transit.

seed.name: Payment Due
seed.description: Representing that payment is due on an order.

seed.name: Pickup
seed.description: Representing availability of an order for pickup.

seed.name: Processing
seed.description: Representing that an order is being processed.

seed.name: Problem
seed.description: Representing that there is a problem with the order.

seed.name: Returned
seed.description: Representing that an order has been returned.
